turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I want to order pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lover's with a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you wanted meat lovers for all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many meatlovers did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and the other 2 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering 4 medium pizzas with gluten free crust, 2 meatlovers and 2 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pick up in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
